name: Dead Weight (underben)
description:
A bullet-hell that progressively gets harder as you continiue through the game. Your only form of dmg comes from a fighter-model spaceship that you drag/swing around. It deals contanct-dmg to enemies and has the ability to shoot.

Be sure to choose gamplay-style  at the start of the menu

Check the "Controlls" page in the game.

("spinnburst" in conrtolls is removed, just forgot to remove it from the conrtolls list

Personally i recommend spinning.... a lot   :)

I had a lot of problems with the game not scaling right when i uploaded it, so it might not look completely right.
